constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 217 (Thursday, December 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. McNERNEY:
H.R. 6313.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States grants Congress the authority to enact this bill.
[Page H7833]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To designate the Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in French Camp, California, as the "Richard A. Pittman Department of Veterans Affairs Health Care Clinic".
